data.description: Filter out words or phrases from strings.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The namespace Filter::Swears is very clear and obvious and it
    relates accurately to the purpose of the module.

    Although the fitered words do not necessarily have to be swear
    words, the module was originally created with this intention and so
    gives people a clear understanding of what the module can do for
    them.
